hero.title: Welcome to Tomex Group
hero.subtitle: Your Partner in Multiple Industries
hero.description: We provide comprehensive solutions across promotional products, medical supplies, sports equipment, IT solutions, and hotel supplies.

leadership.title: Our Leadership Team
leadership.subtitle: Meet the directors who lead our divisions with expertise and vision

subsidaires.gift: Premium promotional products and corporate gift

gift.description: Our TomexGift division offers professional, tailor-made promotional gift solutions for companies, aiming to increase brand awareness, strengthen client relationships, and effectively communicate corporate identity.
gift.products: Our product range includes over 100,000 gift items designed for everyday business needs and campaigns. These include practical office supplies, stylish mugs, bottles, and thermoses, textiles, as well as innovative technological tools suited to modern lifestyles.
gift.branding: We make the entire product selection unique with our local branding capabilities, which not only make our services faster but also more cost-effective. Whether it's logo printing, engraving, or complete branding solutions, we guarantee that the final result reflects our partners' brand values.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.speed: Speed and flexibility: We perform branding in-house, ensuring short turnaround times.
whyUs.uniqueness: Uniqueness: We help create creative and eye-catching solutions to help our clients stand out in the market.
whyUs.quality: Quality: We only offer products that enhance brand visibility through long-term use.

products.description: Unique promotional items in our catalog

ourBrandingTechnic.description: Watch how we transform ordinary products into powerful branded merchandise

customCorporateGifts.description: Tailored gift solutions that reflect your brand's values and message.

eventMerchandise.description: Memorable promotional items for conferences, trade shows, and corporate events.

productCategories.description: Comprehensive range of medical and safety products

protectiveEquipent.description: High-quality protective gloves and clothing for medical and industrial use.

hygieneProducts.description: Essential hygiene supplies for maintaining clean and safe environments.

disposableTools.description: Reliable disposable equipment meeting industry standards.

meetOurTeam.description: Our experienced professionals ensure the highest quality medical supplies and safety equipment

med.description: Our TomexMed division offers disposable products and protective equipment for the healthcare and industrial sectors. Our primary goal is to support the safe and hygienic operations of factories, meat processing plants, and healthcare institutions.
med.products: Our product range includes protective gloves, clothing, hygiene products, and other disposable tools that comply with the strictest industry standards.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.reliability: Reliability: We work with consistently available stock.
whyUs.quality: Quality assurance: Our products meet the highest healthcare and industrial requirements.
whyUs.expertise: Expertise: Our years of experience ensure the best solutions for our partners.

productCategories.description: Complete range of sports equipment and fan merchandise

teamApparel.description: Premium quality team uniforms and training wear from Puma.

fanMerchandise.description: Official team merchandise and supporter gear.

sportsEquipment.description: Professional equipment for training and competition.

meetOurTeam.description: Our experienced professionals combine sports expertise with business acumen

sport.description: Our TomexSport division offers tailored solutions in the world of sports for both teams and fans. Our primary focus is designing fan shops for sports teams and producing custom products that reflect the identity of the respective club.
sport.products: Our product range includes premium team apparel, fan merchandise, and equipment for sports and recovery. We take pride in being an official reseller of Puma, allowing us to outfit teams in professional brands that fully meet their needs.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.expertise: Expertise: Our team, supported by professional athletes, guarantees sport-specific solutions.
whyUs.uniqueness: Uniqueness: Branded team apparel and fan merchandise all in one place.
whyUs.quality: Quality partnership: As an official Puma reseller, we provide premium solutions.

productCategories.description: Complete range of premium hotel supplies and amenities

roomAmenities.description: Premium quality hotel amenities and guest supplies.

textilesAndLinens.description: High-quality textiles and linens for every room.

meetOurTeam.description: Our experienced professionals ensure the highest quality hotel supplies and guest experience

hotelDivisionLead.name: Hotel Division Lead
hotelDivisionLead.description: 20+ years of experience in hotel management and supplies.

divisionSalesManager.name: Hotel Division Sales Manager
divisionSalesManager.description: 20+ years of experience in hotel management and supplies.

hotel.description: Our Sz√°llodapro division offers professional solutions for accommodations, aiming to perfect the guest experience down to the finest details.
hotel.products: Our product portfolio includes premium-quality hotel amenities, textiles, hygiene products, cosmetics, and slippers. Thanks to our European manufacturing partnerships and substantial stock availability, our products can be fully customized to match a hotel's branding, including personalized logos, within just one month.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.tailored: Tailored products: All our products can be customized to fit the hotel's design and needs.
whyUs.delivery: Fast delivery: We work with short lead times, shipping directly from our Budapest warehouse to minimize restocking delays.
whyUs.quality: European manufacturing background: Through our partners, we ensure the highest quality.

customDevelopment.description: Tailored web and application development solutions.

aiIntegration.description: Implementation of AI and machine learning solutions.

meetOurTeam.description: Our experienced professionals are here to help you with your digital transformation journey

itLead.name: IT Lead
itLead.description: 7+ years of experience in IT solutions and digital transformation.

tech.description: Our TomexTech division offers professional digital solutions for businesses, helping companies establish a presence in the digital space, modernize outdated systems, and streamline their processes.
tech.services: Our services include web development, system simplification and management, and comprehensive IT consulting. Leveraging our expertise in frontend and backend development, we provide end-to-end solutions, including website, application, and custom system development.

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.presence: Digital presence: We help build your company's online identity with modern and functional websites and systems.
whyUs.solutions: Comprehensive solutions: With our expertise in frontend and backend development, we cover all needs, from custom software to the necessary hardware.
whyUs.ai: AI support: From implementing artificial intelligence to advisory services, we guide our clients in finding optimal solutions.
whyUs.maintenance: Maintenance and operations: We not only develop but also ensure the continuous operation and improvement of our systems.
